name: Fungi Garden
description:
~EARLY PROTOTYPE BUILD!~ Controls Movement Controls: Up......W key or Up arrow key Down....S key or Down arrow key Left....A key or Left arrow key Right...D key or Right arrow key Special Controls Advance Scene..Space key Quit/Exit......Escape key Story

The mycelium spreads through the land. You are a super-conciousness that experiences time differently. You are a guardian of the forest and appear above ground as a chunky, cute, flowing mushroom.

Help the ancient tree of the forest live a little longer by solving puzzles that are stopping the flow of root-networked resources from their neighbours.

Credits Art

Green Rat
Goat Planet

Code

Mind Cauldron (Darren K)

The Current State of the Game

The currently available build contains only the basic features required for the developers to test and continue working on the game.

This does not contain gameplay.

If you are interested and would like to see more, you can get in touch here or tune in to our live development stream at https://twitch.tv/mindcauldrongames

Thanks for your support!

Stay safe :)
